original_text: And in the days of Saul they made war with the Hagarites, who fell by their hand: and they dwelt in their tents throughout all the east land of Gilead.
korean_text: 사울 왕 때에 그들이 하갈 사람과 더불어 싸워 손으로 쳐죽이고 길르앗 동쪽 온 땅에서 장막에 거주하였더라

sentences.original_text: And in the days of Saul
they made war with the Hagarites
and they dwelt in their tents
throughout all the east land of Gilead
